00076 void CovariateParams::clear()
00077 {
00078     m_allCovariateMap.clear();
00079     m_vSignalCovariates.clear();
00080     m_vLRCovariates.clear();
00081     m_vAPCovariates.clear();
00082     m_vSignalBinningType.clear();
00083     m_vSignalBinSizes.clear();
00084     m_vLRBinningType.clear();
00085     m_vLRBinSizes.clear();
00086     m_vIQRScaling.clear();
00087     m_vLRSubractFromXY.clear();
00088     m_vAPBinningType.clear();
00089     m_vAPBinSizes.clear();
00090 
00091     m_vCoarseAPAdjust.clear();
00092     m_vCoarseAPAdjustStep.clear();
00093     m_vCoarseAPAdjustWindow.clear();
00094     m_vCoarseAPAdjustPointCount.clear();
00095     m_vCoarseAPAdjustBandwidth.clear();
00096     m_vCoarseAPAdjustCutoff.clear();
00097     m_vCoarseAPAdjustCleanthreshold.clear();
00098     m_vCoarseAPAdjustOutliertrim.clear();
00099     m_masterPeakPointCount = -1;
00100     m_masterPeakBandwidth = -1;
00101     m_covariatePeakPointCount = -1;
00102     m_covariatePeakBandwidth = -1;
00103     m_kernelFunctionSelection.clear();
00104 }

00106 void CovariateParams::checkParams(BaseEngine& engine)
00107 {
00108     // Use the determineCovariateMap method to run the ususal parsing.
00109     // This may throw an exception.
00110     determineCovariateMap(engine);
00111 
00112     // Check that the map, bin-type, and bin-count dimensions agree.
00113     //if (m_vSignalCovariates.size() != m_vSignalBinningType.size())
00114     //{
00115     //    Err::errAbort("signal-adjustment-covariates option error - the number elements for order, bin-type and bin-count must match");
00116     //}
00117 
00118     //if (m_vSignalBinningType.size() != m_vSignalBinSizes.size())
00119     //{
00120     //    Err::errAbort("signal-adjustment-covariates option error - the number elements for order, bin-type and bin-count must match");
00121     //}
00122 
00123     vector<int> numElements;
00124     numElements.push_back(m_vSignalCovariates.size());
00125     numElements.push_back(m_vSignalBinningType.size());
00126     numElements.push_back(m_vSignalBinSizes.size());
00127     elementCountMustMatch(numElements, "signal-adjustment-covariates option error - the number elements for order, bin-type and bin-count must match");
00128 
00129     //if (m_vLRCovariates.size() != m_vLRBinningType.size())
00130     //{
00131     //    Err::errAbort("lr-adjustment-covariates option error - the number elements for order, bin-type and bin-count must match");
00132     //}
00133 
00134     //if (m_vLRBinningType.size() != m_vLRBinSizes.size())
00135     //{
00136     //    Err::errAbort("lr-adjustment-covariates option error - the number elements for order, bin-type and bin-count must match");
00137     //}
00138 
00139     //if (m_vLRBinSizes.size() != m_vIQRScaling.size())
00140     //{
00141     //    Err::errAbort("lr-adjustment-covariates option error - the number elements for order, bin-type, bin-count and iqr-scaling must match");
00142     //}
00143 
00144     //if (m_vIQRScaling.size() != m_vLRSubractFromXY.size())
00145     //{
00146     //    Err::errAbort("lr-adjustment-covariates option error - the number elements for order, bin-type, bin-count, iqr-scaling and subtract-from-XY must match");
00147     //}
00148 
00149     numElements.clear();
00150     numElements.push_back(m_vLRCovariates.size());
00151     numElements.push_back(m_vLRBinningType.size());
00152     numElements.push_back(m_vLRBinSizes.size());
00153     numElements.push_back(m_vIQRScaling.size());
00154     numElements.push_back(m_vLRSubractFromXY.size());
00155     elementCountMustMatch(numElements, "lr-adjustment-covariates option error - the number elements for order, bin-type, bin-count, iqr-scaling and subtract-from-XY must match");
00156 
00157 
00158     //if (m_vAPCovariates.size() != m_vAPBinningType.size())
00159     //{
00160     //    Err::errAbort("allele-peaks-adjustment-covariates option error - the number elements for order, bin-type and bin-count must match");
00161     //}
00162 
00163     //if (m_vAPBinningType.size() != m_vAPBinSizes.size())
00164     //{
00165     //    Err::errAbort("allele-peaks-adjustment-covariates option error - the number elements for order, bin-type and bin-count must match");
00166     //}
00167 
00168     numElements.clear();
00169     numElements.push_back(m_vAPCovariates.size());
00170     numElements.push_back(m_vAPBinningType.size());
00171     numElements.push_back(m_vAPBinSizes.size());
00172     elementCountMustMatch(numElements, "allele-peaks-adjustment-covariates option error - the number elements for order, bin-type and bin-count must match");
00173 
00174     if (anyCoarseAPAdjustments())
00175     {
00176         numElements.clear();
00177         numElements.push_back(m_vAPCovariates.size());
00178         numElements.push_back(m_vCoarseAPAdjust.size());
00179         numElements.push_back(m_vCoarseAPAdjustStep.size());
00180         numElements.push_back(m_vCoarseAPAdjustWindow.size());
00181         numElements.push_back(m_vCoarseAPAdjustPointCount.size());
00182         numElements.push_back(m_vCoarseAPAdjustBandwidth.size());
00183         numElements.push_back(m_vCoarseAPAdjustCutoff.size());
00184         numElements.push_back(m_vCoarseAPAdjustCleanthreshold.size());
00185         numElements.push_back(m_vCoarseAPAdjustOutliertrim.size());
00186 
00187         // Err::errAbort("allele-peaks-adjustment-covariates option error - the number elements for any of the coarse-allele-peak-adjustment sub-options, if used, must match the number of elements for order, bin-type and bin-count");
00188         elementCountMustMatch(numElements, "allele-peaks-adjustment-covariates option error - the number elements for any of the coarse-allele-peak-adjustment sub-options, if used, must match the number of elements for order, bin-type and bin-count");
00189     }
00190 
00191     for (int i = 0; i < m_vSignalBinSizes.size(); ++i)
00192     {
00193         if (getNumSignalBins(i) <= 0 && isSignalCovariateDiscrete(i) == false) {Err::errAbort("signal-adjustment-covariates option error - bin-count may not be less than or equal to zero for a non-discrete bin type.");}
00194     }
00195 
00196     for (int i = 0; i < m_vLRBinSizes.size(); ++i)
00197     {
00198         if (getNumLRBins(i) <= 0 && isLRCovariateDiscrete(i) == false) Err::errAbort("lr-adjustment-covariates option error - bin-count may not be less than or equal to zero for a non-discrete bin type.");
00199     }
00200 
00201     for (int i = 0; i < m_vAPBinSizes.size(); ++i)
00202     {
00203         if (getNumAPBins(i) <= 0 && isAPCovariateDiscrete(i) == false) Err::errAbort("allele-peaks-adjustment-covariates option error - bin-count may not be less than or equal to zero for a non-discrete bin type.");
00204     }
00205 
00206     if (anyFileBasedCovariates() == true)
00207     {
00208         if (engine.getOpt("covariates-file") == "")
00209         {
00210             Err::errAbort("The lr-adjustment-covariates or signal-adjustment-covariates options refer to one or more file-based covariates but the covariates-file option is missing or empty.");
00211         }
00212     }
00213 
00214     if ((engine.getOpt("covariates-file") != "") && (!Fs::fileExists(engine.getOpt("covariates-file"))))
00215     {
00216         Err::errAbort("Must specify a valid covariates-file.");
00217     }
00218 
00219     // Don't leave any residual state
00220     clear();
00221 }
00222 
00223 bool CovariateParams::anyCoarseAPAdjustments()
00224 {
00225     bool result = false;
00226     for (vector<string>::iterator ii = m_vCoarseAPAdjust.begin(); ii != m_vCoarseAPAdjust.end(); ++ii)
00227     {
00228         if (*ii != "off") { result = true; break; }
00229     }
00230     return result;
00231 }
00232 
00233 void CovariateParams::elementCountMustMatch(vector<int>& numElements, const string& errmsg)
00234 {
00235     int num = 0;
00236     vector<int>::iterator ii = numElements.begin();
00237     if (ii != numElements.end()) { num = *ii; ++ii; }
00238     for (; ii != numElements.end(); ++ii)
00239     {
00240         if (*ii != num) { Err::errAbort(errmsg); }
00241     }
00242 }
00243 
00244 /** Initializes the signal and LR covariate map members.
00245     The value represents the index in CNProbeSet::getCovariateValue().
00246     The index is the CovariateEnum.
00247     Side effect: this method also initializes the number of bins and binning type paramters.
00248   */
00249 void CovariateParams::determineCovariateMap(BaseEngine& engine)
00250 {
00251     clear();
00252 
00253     string signalStr;
00254     vector<int> signalCovariateIndexes;
00255     if (engine.isOptDefined("signal-adjustment-covariates")) signalStr = engine.getOpt("signal-adjustment-covariates");
00256     if (signalStr.empty() == false)
00257     {
00258         string name;
00259         map<string, string> param;
00260         SelfCreate::fillInNameParam(signalStr, name, param);
00261 
00262         map<string, string>::iterator iter;
00263         if ((iter = param.find("order")) != param.end())
00264         {
00265             vector<string> order = StringUtils::Split(iter->second, ",");
00266             addCovariatesToMap(order, m_vSignalCovariates);
00267         }
00268     }
00269 
00270     string lrString;
00271     vector<int> lrCovariateIndexes;
00272     if (engine.isOptDefined("lr-adjustment-covariates")) lrString = engine.getOpt("lr-adjustment-covariates");
00273     if (lrString.empty() == false)
00274     {
00275         string name;
00276         map<string, string> param;
00277         SelfCreate::fillInNameParam(lrString, name, param);
00278 
00279         map<string, string>::iterator iter;
00280         if ((iter = param.find("order")) != param.end())
00281         {
00282             vector<string> order = StringUtils::Split(iter->second, ",");
00283             addCovariatesToMap(order, m_vLRCovariates);
00284         }
00285     }
00286 
00287     string apString;
00288     vector<int> apCovariateIndexes;
00289     if (engine.isOptDefined("allele-peaks-adjustment-covariates")) apString = engine.getOpt("allele-peaks-adjustment-covariates");
00290     if (apString.empty() == false)
00291     {
00292         string name;
00293         map<string, string> param;
00294         SelfCreate::fillInNameParam(apString, name, param);
00295 
00296         map<string, string>::iterator iter;
00297         if ((iter = param.find("order")) != param.end())
00298         {
00299             vector<string> order = StringUtils::Split(iter->second, ",");
00300             addCovariatesToMap(order, m_vAPCovariates);
00301         }
00302     }
00303 
00304     initializeSignalBinTypeAndNum(signalStr);
00305     initializeLRBinTypeAndNum(lrString);
00306     initializeAPBinTypeAndNum(apString);
00307     initializeAdditionalLRParams(lrString);
00308     initializeAdditionalAPParams(apString);
00309 
00310     Verbose::out(4, "CovariateParams::determineCovariateMap - num of covariates to load: " + Convert::toString((int)m_allCovariateMap.size()));
00311 }
00312 
00313 /**  Restore covariate parameter from the Parameters section of the CN reference to the
00314   *  corresponding class member:
00315   *
00316   * "all"                           -> m_allCovariateMap
00317   * "signal"                        -> m_vSignalCovariates
00318   * "log2ratio                      -> m_vLRCovariates
00319   * "signal-binning-types"          -> m_vSignalBinningType
00320   * "signal-bin-sizes"              -> m_vSignalBinSizes
00321   * "log2ratio-binning-types"       -> m_vLRBinningType
00322   * "log2ratio-bin-sizes"           -> m_vLRBinSizes
00323   * "log2ratio-iqr-scaling"         -> m_vIQRScaling
00324   * "log2ratio-subtract-from-XY"    -> m_vLRSubractFromXY
00325   */
00326 void CovariateParams::restoreCovariateParams(std::string str)
00327 {
00328     str = str.substr(m_CNReferencePrefix.size());   // chop the prefix off
00329     int iFindIndex = str.find('=');
00330     string covVal  = str.substr(iFindIndex + 1);
00331     if (covVal.empty()) {
00332         return;
00333     }
00334 
00335     string covName = str.substr(0, iFindIndex);
00336     if (covName == "all") {
00337         translateFromParamString(covVal, m_allCovariateMap);
00338     } else if (covName == "signal") {
00339         Convert::strToIntVec(covVal, ',', m_vSignalCovariates);
00340     } else if (covName == "log2ratio") {
00341         Convert::strToIntVec(covVal, ',', m_vLRCovariates);
00342     } else if (covName == "allele-peaks") {
00343         Convert::strToIntVec(covVal, ',', m_vAPCovariates);
00344     } else if (covName == "signal-bin-sizes") {
00345         Convert::strToIntVec(covVal, ',', m_vSignalBinSizes);
00346     } else if (covName == "log2ratio-bin-sizes") {
00347         Convert::strToIntVec(covVal, ',', m_vLRBinSizes);
00348     } else if (covName == "allele-peaks-bin-sizes") {
00349         Convert::strToIntVec(covVal, ',', m_vAPBinSizes);
00350     } else if (covName == "signal-binning-types") {
00351         Convert::strToStrVec(covVal, ',', m_vSignalBinningType);
00352     } else if (covName == "log2ratio-binning-types") {
00353         Convert::strToStrVec(covVal, ',', m_vLRBinningType);
00354     } else if (covName == "allele-peaks-binning-types") {
00355         Convert::strToStrVec(covVal, ',', m_vAPBinningType);
00356     } else if (covName == "log2ratio-iqr-scaling") {
00357         Convert::strToStrVec(covVal, ',', m_vIQRScaling);
00358     } else if (covName == "log2ratio-subtract-from-XY") {
00359         Convert::strToStrVec(covVal, ',', m_vLRSubractFromXY);
00360     } else if (covName == "allele-peaks-coarse-adjustment") {
00361         Convert::strToStrVec(covVal, ',', m_vCoarseAPAdjust);
00362     } else if (covName == "coarse-allele-peak-adjustment-step") {
00363         Convert::strToIntVec(covVal, ',', m_vCoarseAPAdjustStep);
00364     } else if (covName == "coarse-allele-peak-adjustment-window") {
00365         Convert::strToIntVec(covVal, ',', m_vCoarseAPAdjustWindow);
00366     } else if (covName == "coarse-allele-peak-adjustment-point-count") {
00367         Convert::strToIntVec(covVal, ',', m_vCoarseAPAdjustPointCount);
00368     } else if (covName == "coarse-allele-peak-adjustment-bandwidth") {
00369         Convert::strToDoubleVec(covVal, ',', m_vCoarseAPAdjustBandwidth);
00370     } else if (covName == "coarse-allele-peak-adjustment-cutoff") {
00371         Convert::strToDoubleVec(covVal, ',', m_vCoarseAPAdjustCutoff);
00372     } else if (covName == "coarse-allele-peak-adjustment-clean-threshold") {
00373         Convert::strToDoubleVec(covVal, ',', m_vCoarseAPAdjustCleanthreshold);
00374     } else if (covName == "coarse-allele-peak-adjustment-outlier-trim") {
00375         Convert::strToDoubleVec(covVal, ',', m_vCoarseAPAdjustOutliertrim);
00376     } else if (covName == "master-peaks-point-count") {
00377         m_masterPeakPointCount = Convert::toInt(covVal);
00378     } else if (covName == "master-peaks-bandwidth") {
00379         m_masterPeakBandwidth = Convert::toDouble(covVal);
00380     } else if (covName == "covariate-bin-peaks-point-count") {
00381         m_covariatePeakPointCount = Convert::toInt(covVal);
00382     } else if (covName == "covariate-bin-peaks-bandwidth") {
00383         m_covariatePeakBandwidth = Convert::toDouble(covVal);
00384     } else if (covName == "kernel-function-selection") {
00385         m_kernelFunctionSelection = covVal;
00386     } else if (covName == "signal-command") {
00387         m_signalCommand = covVal;
00388     } else if (covName == "log2ratio-command") {
00389         m_LRCommand = covVal;
00390     } else if (covName == "allele-peaks-command") {
00391         m_APCommand = covVal;
00392     }
00393 }
00394 
00395 int CovariateParams::mapCovariateNameToIndex(const std::string& str)
00396 {
00397     map<string, int>::iterator ii = m_allCovariateMap.find(str);
00398     if (ii == m_allCovariateMap.end()) return -1;
00399     else return ii->second;
00400 }
00401 
00402 void CovariateParams::addCovariatesToMap(vector<string>& cov, vector<int>& arr)
00403 {
00404     arr.clear();
00405 
00406     for (vector<string>::iterator ii = cov.begin(); ii != cov.end(); ++ii)
00407     {
00408         // Check if the covariate is already in the list
00409         if (m_allCovariateMap.find(*ii) == m_allCovariateMap.end())
00410         {
00411             int index = m_allCovariateMap.size();
00412             m_allCovariateMap[*ii] = index;
00413         }
00414         arr.push_back(m_allCovariateMap[*ii]);
00415     }
00416 }

00418 bool CovariateParams::useEquallyPopulatedSignalBins(int covariateIndex)
00419 {
00420     return doesBinningTypeMatch(covariateIndex, m_vSignalBinningType, "equally-populated");
00421 }

00426 }

00458 bool CovariateParams::isAPCovariateDiscrete(int covariateIndex)
00459 {
00460     return doesBinningTypeMatch(covariateIndex, m_vAPBinningType, "discrete");

00462 
00463 bool CovariateParams::doesBinningTypeMatch(int index, std::vector<std::string>& vBinTypes, const string& type)
00464 {
00465     if (vBinTypes.size() <= index)
00466     {
00467         Err::errAbort("Bin type index is out of bounds - " + Convert::toString(index));
00468     }
00469     return (vBinTypes[index].compare(type) == 0);
00470 }
00471 
00472 int CovariateParams::getNumSignalBins(int covariateIndex)
00473 {
00474     return getNumBins(covariateIndex, m_vSignalBinSizes);
00475 }
00476 
00477 int CovariateParams::getNumLRBins(int covariateIndex)
00478 {
00479     return getNumBins(covariateIndex, m_vLRBinSizes);
00480 }
00481 
00482 int CovariateParams::getNumAPBins(int covariateIndex)
00483 {
00484     return getNumBins(covariateIndex, m_vAPBinSizes);
00485 }
00486 
00487 int CovariateParams::getNumBins(int index, const std::vector<int>& vBinSizes)
00488 {
00489     if (vBinSizes.size() <= index)
00490     {
00491         Err::errAbort("Bin size index is out of bounds - " + Convert::toString(index));
00492     }
00493     return vBinSizes[index];
00494 }
00495 
00496 void CovariateParams::initializeSignalBinTypeAndNum(const string& signalStr)
00497 {
00498     initializeBinTypeAndNum(signalStr, m_vSignalBinningType, m_vSignalBinSizes);
00499 }
00500     
00501 void CovariateParams::initializeLRBinTypeAndNum(const string& lrParameter)
00502 {

00511 void CovariateParams::initializeAdditionalLRParams(const string& lrParameter)
00512 {
00513     string name;
00514     map<string, string> param;
00515     SelfCreate::fillInNameParam(lrParameter, name, param);
00516 
00517     map<string, string>::iterator iter;
00518     if ((iter = param.find("iqr-scaling")) != param.end())
00519     {
00520         m_vIQRScaling = StringUtils::Split(iter->second, ",");
00521     }
00522 
00523     if ((iter = param.find("subtract-from-XY")) != param.end())
00524     {
00525         m_vLRSubractFromXY = StringUtils::Split(iter->second, ",");
00526     }
00527 }

00529 void CovariateParams::initializeAdditionalAPParams(const string& apParameter)
00530 {
00531     string name;
00532     map<string, string> param;
00533     SelfCreate::fillInNameParam(apParameter, name, param);
00534 
00535     map<string, string>::iterator iter;
00536     if ((iter = param.find("coarse-allele-peak-adjustment")) != param.end())
00537     {
00538         m_vCoarseAPAdjust = StringUtils::Split(iter->second, ",");
00539     }
00540     else
00541     {
00542       // set the default to no
00543       for (int i = 0; i < m_vAPCovariates.size(); ++i) { m_vCoarseAPAdjust.push_back("off"); }
00544     }
00545 
00546     paramValueToIntVector(param, "coarse-allele-peak-adjustment-step", m_vCoarseAPAdjustStep);
00547     paramValueToIntVector(param, "coarse-allele-peak-adjustment-window", m_vCoarseAPAdjustWindow);
00548     paramValueToIntVector(param, "coarse-allele-peak-adjustment-point-count", m_vCoarseAPAdjustPointCount);
00549     paramValueToDoubleVector(param, "coarse-allele-peak-adjustment-bandwidth", m_vCoarseAPAdjustBandwidth);
00550     paramValueToDoubleVector(param, "coarse-allele-peak-adjustment-cutoff", m_vCoarseAPAdjustCutoff);
00551     paramValueToDoubleVector(param, "coarse-allele-peak-adjustment-clean-threshold", m_vCoarseAPAdjustCleanthreshold);
00552     paramValueToDoubleVector(param, "coarse-allele-peak-adjustment-outlier-trim", m_vCoarseAPAdjustOutliertrim);
00553 
00554     m_masterPeakPointCount = paramValueToInt(param, "master-peaks-point-count", -1);
00555     m_masterPeakBandwidth = paramValueToDouble(param, "master-peaks-bandwidth", -1.0);
00556     m_covariatePeakPointCount = paramValueToInt(param, "covariate-bin-peaks-point-count", -1);
00557     m_covariatePeakBandwidth = paramValueToDouble(param, "covariate-bin-peaks-bandwidth", -1.0);
00558 
00559     if ((iter = param.find("kernel-function-selection")) != param.end())
00560     {
00561         m_kernelFunctionSelection = iter->second;
00562     }
00563 }
00564 
00565 void CovariateParams::initializeBinTypeAndNum(const string& parameterString, vector<string>& vType, vector<int>& vNum)
00566 {
00567     string name;
00568     map<string, string> param;
00569     SelfCreate::fillInNameParam(parameterString, name, param);
00570 
00571     map<string, string>::iterator iter;
00572     if ((iter = param.find("bin-type")) != param.end())
00573     {
00574         vType = StringUtils::Split(iter->second, ",");
00575     }
00576  
00577     vNum.clear();
00578     if ((iter = param.find("bin-count")) != param.end())
00579     {
00580         vector<string> numBins = StringUtils::Split(iter->second, ",");
00581         for (vector<string>::iterator ii = numBins.begin(); ii != numBins.end(); ++ii)
00582         {
00583             vNum.push_back(Convert::toInt(*ii));
00584         }
00585     }
00586 }

00588 void CovariateParams::paramValueToIntVector(map<string, string>& params, const string& paramName, vector<int>& vInt)
00589 {
00590     map<string, string>::iterator iter;
00591     if ((iter = params.find(paramName)) != params.end())
00592     {
00593         vector<string> values = StringUtils::Split(iter->second, ",");
00594         for (vector<string>::iterator ii = values.begin(); ii != values.end(); ++ii)
00595         {
00596             vInt.push_back(Convert::toInt(*ii));
00597         }
00598     }
00599 }

00602 {
00603     map<string, string>::iterator iter;
00604     if ((iter = params.find(paramName)) != params.end())
00605     {
00606         vector<string> values = StringUtils::Split(iter->second, ",");
00607         for (vector<string>::iterator ii = values.begin(); ii != values.end(); ++ii)
00608         {
00609             vDouble.push_back(Convert::toDouble(*ii));
00610         }
00611     }
00612 }
00613 
00614 int CovariateParams::paramValueToInt(map<string, string>& params, const string& paramName, int defaultValue)
00615 {
00616     map<string, string>::iterator iter;
00617     if ((iter = params.find(paramName)) != params.end())
00618     {
00619         vector<string> values = StringUtils::Split(iter->second, ",");
00620         if (values.size() == 0) { Err::errAbort(paramName + " sub-option error - one value expected, none found"); }
00621         if (values.size() > 1) { Err::errAbort(paramName + " sub-option error - only one value expected"); }
00622         return Convert::toInt(values[0]);
00623     }
00624     else { return defaultValue; }
00625 }
00626 
00627 double CovariateParams::paramValueToDouble(map<string, string>& params, const string& paramName, double defaultValue)
00628 {
00629     map<string, string>::iterator iter;
00630     if ((iter = params.find(paramName)) != params.end())
00631     {
00632         vector<string> values = StringUtils::Split(iter->second, ",");
00633         if (values.size() == 0) { Err::errAbort(paramName + " sub-option error - one value expected, none found"); }
00634         if (values.size() > 1) { Err::errAbort(paramName + " sub-option error - only one value expected"); }
00635         return Convert::toDouble(values[0]);
00636     }
00637     else { return defaultValue; }
00638 }
00639 
00640 std::string CovariateParams::translateToParamString(const map<string, int>& covMap)
00641 {
00642     vector<string> temp;
00643     temp.resize(covMap.size());
00644     for (map<string, int>::const_iterator ii = covMap.begin(); ii != covMap.end(); ++ii)
00645     {
00646         temp[ii->second] = ii->first;
00647     }
00648 
00649     std::string retStr;
00650     for (int iIndex = 0; iIndex < temp.size(); iIndex++)
00651     {
00652         retStr += ",";
00653         retStr += temp[iIndex];
00654     }
00655     return retStr.substr(1);
00656 }
00657 
00658 void CovariateParams::translateFromParamString(const string& str, map<string, int>& retMap)
00659 {
00660     std::vector<std::string> vec;
00661     Convert::strToStrVec(str, ',', vec);
00662     retMap.clear();
00663     for (int ii = 0; ii < vec.size(); ii++)
00664     {
00665         retMap[vec[ii]] = ii;
00666     }
00667 }
00668 
00669 bool CovariateParams::isReservedCovariateName(const std::string& str)
00670 {
00671     return (str == "fragment-adapter-type" ||
00672             str == "fragment-length" ||
00673             str == "fragment-gc" ||
00674             str == "probe-gc" ||
00675             str == "local-gc" ||
00676             str == "median-signal" ||
00677             str == "marker-class");
00678 }
00679 
00680 bool CovariateParams::anyFileBasedCovariates()
00681 {
00682     // Are there any non-reserved covariates
00683     for (map<string, int>::iterator ii = m_allCovariateMap.begin(); ii != m_allCovariateMap.end(); ++ii)
00684     {
00685         if (isReservedCovariateName(ii->first) == false) {return true;}
00686     }
00687     return false;
00688 }
